name: VINAYAGA TRUST
briefDescription: * We help the people become aware of their own rights so that they get their due and are able to play an active role in society. * We provide, organize, promote, maintain, manage and render charitable and benevolent service and all other ancillary services to the poor, the sick, the distressed, the destitute, the old, the orphan, the homeless, the disabled, the refugees and victims of civil disturbances, riot, famine, earthquake, flood, fire, pestilence, epidemic and other natural calamities. * We render Philanthropic, Educational and Charitable Services to the public in General and particularly to persons who are living in villages and who suffer from social and economic backwardness without discrimination on the basis of caste, creed, rel
